document.full_text: as andre ethier chases joe dimaggio's record hitting streak, jimmy rollins, who has the longest hitting streak of the last 24 years, thinks the record could fall.
document.title: as ethier pursues dimaggio, rollins believes streak can be broken
lines_and_colors: as andre ethier chases joe dimaggio's record hitting streak, jimmy rollins, who has the longest hitting streak of the last 24 years, thinks the record could fall.
